channel.title: Corporal Beast Problem (won't hit always)
channel.description:
So I've put the Corporal Beastro Express :) on my server but!! It won't hit all the time.. This is how his hits would go for example.
0-0-0-0-43-0-0-0-29-0-0-0-0-0-19
I want to make it so it goes for example like this;
10-43-15-22-34-0-33-0-0-12
Like you know... Accurate..
